name: Document Management Policy
Impact: The use of electronic documents is promoted.
Opportunities: The use of paper documents is limited to exceptional cases.
Strategy: Ensure that all documents that support the activities are prepared with the support of dedicated software and are electronically signed. Address the security of information held.
Actions: Adopting the standards ISO 18001, ISO 22301, SA 14001, and SA 8000. Sorting and collection of paper letters addressed to Father Christmas in the operational and logistic process.
